key.name: m0
key.description: Transform extension mechanism: to reference an authority or rules for a type of transformation

type.name: gost
type.description: Euro-Asian Council for Standardization, Metrology and Certification

type.name: mcst
type.description: Korean Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism

type.name: ungegn
type.description: United Nations Group of Experts on Geographical Names

type.name: c11
type.description: for hex transforms, using the C11 syntax: \u0061\U0001F4D6

type.name: css
type.description: for hex transforms, using the CSS syntax: \61 \01F4D6, spacing where necessary

type.name: java
type.description: for hex transforms, using the Java syntax: \u0061\uD83D\uDCD6

type.name: percent
type.description: for hex transforms, using the percent syntax: %61%F0%9F%93%96

type.name: perl
type.description: for hex transforms, using the perl syntax: \x{61}\x{1F4D6}

type.name: plain
type.description: for hex transforms, with no surrounding syntax, spacing where necessary: 0061 1F4D6

type.name: unicode
type.description: to hex with the Unicode syntax: U+0061 U+1F4D6, spacing where necessary

type.name: xml
type.description: for hex transforms, using the xml syntax: a📖

type.name: xml10
type.description: for hex transforms, using the xml decimal syntax: a📖

type.name: es3842
type.description: Ethiopian Standards Agency ES 3842:2014 Ethiopic-Latin Transliteration

type.name: sera
type.description: System for Ethiopic Representation in ASCII

type.name: xaleget
type.description: Eritrean Ministry of Education Blin-Latin Transliteration
